snippet.title: Dwarf Fortress- Adventure Mode Beta Trailer
snippet.description:
Beta live now on Steam! Create a character and freely roam the rich simulated world in Adventure Mode. Dwarf Fortress on Steam: https://bit.ly/2PY0P0w

To access the beta, right click Dwarf Fortress in your Steam library - Properties - Betas - dropdown list and select  "beta - Public beta branch”.  No password needed.

🎶The Adventure Mode OST is now available 🎶

Bandcamp: bit.ly/4cXhR4r
Youtube: bit.ly/440xljS
Spotify: bit.ly/3Ul0DGV
Apple Music: bit.ly/4aSep9X

➫Join the Official Dwarf Fortress Discord: https://bit.ly/3W1HvfX
➫Sign up for Dwarf Mail: https://bit.ly/3uYfudW
